short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens JIRA links with the Choosy browser. Based off https://github.com/Unibozu/jira-new-tab extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use the Choosy extension (included with the Choosy for OSX application), this extension watches for any JIRA link clicks and opens them with Choosy instead. This avoids the need to "send the link to choosy" and deal with the browser prompt. Instead, it opens it immediately, which allows Choosy to use the advanced link rules you've setup.

For instance, "open all atlassian links with the JIRA for Mac application" as a rule in the Choosy app.

Choosy App: https://www.choosyosx.com/
